abstracts.cdata!:
The purpose of the project is to provide
            canal irrigation facilities to a total area of 28,700 ha and
            tubewell irrigation to 2,700 ha. It would also provide
            drainage, on-farm development, service roads, agricultural
            extension and research services in the project area and for
            training, advisory services and feasibility studies of
            additional surface irrigation projects.
